challenge_feedback: personally no, but it makes sense to have non-image captchas!
This is preferable because it is at least not difficult to see the physical text.
as a language lover, I wouldn't mind this sort of challenge, but image-captcha is likely much quicker to solve, and more accessible to users who are not English C2 speakers
